title: Head of a Man with Shaven Skull and Large Ears
description:
Black granite head of a man form a statuette. Shaved head, large ears, furrows in forehead. Realistic type with effort at portraiture. Heavy back pillar extending almost to top of head, uninscribed. 

Condition: Nose chipped. Preserved to base of neck.
credit_line: Gift of the Ernest Erickson Foundation, Inc.
section: The Late Period through the Beginning of the Roman Occupation

museum_location.name: This item is not on view
